HDG.BC.content: [slow down] no way out in any direction: Being cast itself toward us—in saying something about Being, we cast it away > perceive the impasse into which Being places us as a sign pointing toward where we already are placed, since we comport ourselves toward beings [presuppositions? also, what is a sign if you already know its parent?] [rather than impasse as aporia: impasse is what it is] > concealed abode, to which essence of our history owes its origin, abode that concerns our essence

HDG.DL.content: hints [traces?]: enigmatic (rätselhaft), Sie winken uns zu, Sie winken ab [hints hint toward us, hint away] > “they beckon ourselves toward that from which they unexpectedly (unversehens) [unforeseeably] bear themselves toward us” > hints & gestures not signs, chiffres (latter have there habitat in metaphysics) [cf. p. 27] > hints/gestures belong to totally other (ganz anderen) Wesensraum [realm of reality?]

HDG.WL.content: acc. Aristotle [classical architectonic (Baugefüge) structure of language], letters show sounds, sounds show passions of soul, passions of soul show matters that arouse them (be-treffenden Sachen) > showing (Zeigen) holds up this classical structure > relation btwn Showing and what it shows (Gezeigten) becomes conventional relation btwn sign (Zeichen) & its signification (Bezeichnetem) > transformation (Änderung) of sign from something that shows (Zeigenden) to something that designates (Bezeichnenden): a change in the nature of truth

HDG.OHF.content: [insidious logic] forehaving of interpretation, that it can’t be present as thematic object clear sign (Anzeichen) of its Seinscharakters, constitutive of interpretation, shares in character of Dasein’s being: Möglichsein (being-possible), modifies itself out of the situation to which the hermeneutic question is operating (Vorhabe not arbitrary/acc. whim)
